CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Overrides behavior involving the options listed, determining execution and order of priority.
Match Against Any Pledge/Gift Match Against Donor Pledge/Gift (default behavior) Match Designation If No Pledge/Gift Create Gift If Pledge Not Found
Format: ["Match Against Any Pledge/Gift", "Match Against Donor Pledge/Gift", "Create Gift If Pledge Not Found"]
CustomField.label: Matching Order
